text: @DHSCgovuk @MattHancock Yes, nice to know that you are prepared to deal with the coronavirus but you are still allowing infected people in. This is such an irresponsible behaviour and I am very disappointed in your response to the crisis. Are you complacent you have been elected for 5 years now?
